attributes.action: After the terrorist attack in London close our border's immediately!!!!
attributes.additional_details: With our country being to welcoming these people have had time to live and study our country enabling them years to plan their terrosim attacks! If we do not act now we are only allowing more time for their net move..... WE do not need war we simply need these people out of our country and our boarders closing IMMEDIATELY!
attributes.background: After the recent terrorist attack we need to ACT now! Which means deporting those who we think may be at risk/involved in terror! Keep our officers armed at all times and close our boarders IMMEDIATELY! Our country has been to welcoming!!!! Officers need to be armed at all times
